title: My brother's birthday

abstract: "Considering all the places we served, I think this is nothing short of a miracle."
description: In Syria, on the way to Beirut, Max Hammond's thoughts turned to his family. One of seven children, Hammond and his three brothers served together in World War II. He recounts a close call that occurred on his brother's birthday and reflects on how lucky he and his brothers are.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002722; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]; Active; 2011
